writing.name: DAY5
writing.text: You walk to class 10 minutes early and see Ash.

writing.name: DAY5_ASH_1_BEFORE_CLASS
writing.text: Ash: When I was walking home I saw Max with a bunch of punks. They were listening to her.

writing.name: DAY5_ASH_2_BEFORE_CLASS
writing.text: You: Really? Did you happen to hear what they were talking about?

writing.name: DAY5_ASH_3_BEFORE_CLASS
writing.text: Ash: No not really but I did pick up on one word, friends.

writing.name: DAY5_MAX_1_BEFORE_CLASS
writing.text: You walk to class 5 minutes early and see Max.?

writing.name: DAY5_MAX_2_BEFORE_CLASS
writing.text: Max: When I was walking back home from the arcade I saw Ash talking to two punks in front of a large house.

writing.name: DAY5_MAX_3_BEFORE_CLASS
writing.text: You: Huh....what were they talking about?

writing.name: DAY5_MAX_4_BEFORE_CLASS
writing.text: Max: I could barely hear them before they noticed, but I think I heard something one word, night.

writing.name: DAY5_CLASSROOM
writing.text: Ash seems to have some problems and Max is helping. you also decide to help.

writing.name: DAY_5_CLASSROOM_DECISION01
writing.text: Meet after school to study together ..

writing.name: DAY_5_DECISION01_1
writing.text: You and Max show up to the decided place.

writing.name: DAY_5_DECISION01_2
writing.text: You: Hey Max this is the right place right? You told Ash we were going to be here?

writing.name: DAY_5_DECISION01_3
writing.text: Max: Yes this is the right place.

writing.name: DAY_5_DECISION01_4
writing.text: 10 more minutes pass without him showing

writing.name: DAY_5_DECISION01_END_5
writing.text: Max: Ash didn’t seem to come I guess…..  um... let's go home then.

writing.name: END_DAY_5
writing.text: You go home after a long day.
